column2: **Job Title: ?E-commerce Account Manager - Business Development ** ** Overview :** We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated E-commerce Account Manager to oversee and drive business development across all leading E-commerce portals in India, including but not limited to Amazon, Flipkart, Jio, and others. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of managing E-commerce accounts, driving sales growth, and fostering strong relationships with key partners. This role requires a strategic thinker with excellent communication skills and a deep understanding of the E-commerce landscape in India. ** Responsibilities: ** 1. **E-commerce Account Management:**    - Manage and optimize seller accounts on leading E-commerce platforms, including Amazon, Flipkart, JioMart, and others.    - Develop and implement strategies to increase sales, improve product visibility, and enhance overall performance.    - Monitor key metrics such as sales trends, product rankings, and customer reviews to identify opportunities for growth. 2. **Business Development:**    - Identify new business opportunities and partnerships to expand our presence on E-commerce platforms.    - Negotiate contracts, terms, and pricing with E-commerce partners to maximize profitability and market reach.    - Stay informed about industry trends, competitor activities, and market developments to capitalize on emerging opportunities. 3. **Relationship Management:**    - Cultivate strong relationships with key stakeholders at E-commerce platforms, including account managers, category managers, and marketing teams.    - Collaborate cross-functionally with internal teams such as marketing, product development, and supply chain to ensure alignment and support for E-commerce initiatives. 4. **Content Management and Optimization:**    - Work closely with creative teams to develop compelling product content, including images, videos, and product descriptions, to drive conversions and enhance the customer experience.    - Continuously optimize product listings, keywords, and search terms to improve search visibility and discoverability. 5. **Performance Analysis and Reporting:**    - Analyze sales data, traffic patterns, and customer behavior to evaluate performance and identify areas for improvement.    - Generate regular reports and insights to track KPIs, monitor progress against goals, and make data-driven recommendations for optimization. ** Qualifications: ** - Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field. - Proven experience (X years) in E-commerce account management and business development, preferably in the Indian market. - Deep understanding of E-commerce platforms, policies, and best practices, with specific expertise in Amazon, Flipkart, and JioMart. - Strong negotiation and communication skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders. - Analytical mindset with proficiency in data analysis tools and Excel. - Strategic thinker with the ability to develop and execute comprehensive E-commerce strategies. - Results-oriented with a track record of driving sales growth and exceeding targets. - Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities effectively. **Location:** Bengaluru **Benefits:** [ competitive salary, health insurance, retirement plans,?Provident fund?etc.] ** Skills: **  - Knowledge of E commerce Platforms - Automotion - Marketing - Customer Acquisition - Customer Engagement - Customer Retention & Loyalty - Analytics & Customer rate Optimization - Project Management Skills - Communication Skills ** Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) :** 1. **Sales Growth:** Measure the increase in sales revenue generated through E-commerce platforms over time.   2. **Conversion Rate:** Track the percentage of visitors to E-commerce product pages who complete a desired action, such as making a purchase.   3. **Market Share:** Assess the percentage of total market sales captured by our products compared to competitors within the E-commerce space.   4. **Customer Satisfaction:** Monitor customer feedback, reviews, and ratings to gauge satisfaction levels with our products and services.   5. **Product Visibility:** Measure the ranking and visibility of our products in search results and category listings on E-commerce platforms.   6. **Inventory Management:** Ensure optimal inventory levels to prevent stockouts and minimize excess inventory holding costs.   7. **Return Rate:** Monitor the percentage of products sold online that are returned by customers, aiming to minimize returns and associated costs.   8. **Average Order Value (AOV):** Track the average value of orders placed through E-commerce platforms, aiming to increase AOV through upselling and cross-selling strategies.   9. **Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC):** Measure the cost incurred to acquire a new customer through E-commerce channels, aiming to optimize marketing and advertising spend.   10. **Competitive Analysis:** Monitor competitor activities, pricing strategies, and market trends to identify opportunities and threats. ** Key Result Indicators (KRIs) :** 1. **Revenue Targets:** Set specific revenue goals for each E-commerce platform and track progress towards achieving those targets.   2. **New Account Acquisition:** Measure the number of new accounts secured on E-commerce platforms to expand our presence and reach new customers.   3. **Partnership Development:** Evaluate the number and quality of partnerships established with E-commerce platforms, aiming to diversify channels and enhance market reach.   4. **Content Quality:** Assess the quality and effectiveness of product content (e.g., images, descriptions) in driving conversions and enhancing the customer experience.   5. **Search Ranking Improvement:** Track improvements in product search rankings and visibility on E-commerce platforms, aiming to achieve higher placement in search results.   6. **Promotional Campaign Performance:** Evaluate the effectiveness of promotional campaigns (e.g., discounts, coupons) in driving sales and increasing customer engagement.   7. **Customer Retention:** Measure the rate at which existing customers return to make repeat purchases, aiming to foster long-term customer loyalty.   8. **Feedback Implementation:** Monitor the implementation of customer feedback and suggestions to improve product offerings, services, and overall customer experience.   9. **Compliance and Policy Adherence:** Ensure compliance with E-commerce platform policies, guidelines, and terms of service to maintain account health and reputation.   10. **ROI on Marketing Spend:** Calculate the return on investment (ROI) for marketing initiatives and advertising campaigns conducted on E-commerce platforms, aiming to maximize ROI and optimize budget allocation. These KPIs and KRIs provide a comprehensive framework for evaluating the performance and success of the E-commerce Account Manager in driving business growth and maximizing opportunities across various E-commerce platforms in India. Given the prominence of Amazon in the Indian E-commerce landscape, it's crucial for the E-commerce Account Manager to possess specific expertise in managing Amazon India online business. Here are additional KPIs and KRIs tailored specifically for expertise with Amazon India: ** Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for Amazon India: ** 1. **Sales Performance on Amazon India:** Measure the total revenue generated from sales on Amazon India, tracking both overall sales growth and performance compared to targets.   2. **Amazon Seller Rating:** Monitor the seller rating and feedback on Amazon India, aiming to maintain a high rating to build trust and credibility with customers.   3. **Amazon Best Seller Rankings:** Track the ranking of products within relevant categories on Amazon India to assess their popularity and competitiveness.   4. **Amazon Advertising Metrics:** Evaluate the performance of advertising campaigns on Amazon India, including metrics such as click-through rate (CTR), conversion rate, and return on ad spend (ROAS).   5. **Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) Metrics:** Monitor FBA metrics such as inventory levels, order fulfillment speed, and seller performance to ensure smooth operations and customer satisfaction.   6. **Amazon Prime Eligibility:** Measure the percentage of products eligible for Amazon Prime and monitor the impact on sales and customer satisfaction.   7. **Product Reviews and Ratings:** Track the quantity and quality of product reviews and ratings on Amazon India, aiming to maintain positive feedback and address any negative reviews promptly.   8. **Amazon Buy Box Percentage:** Monitor the percentage of time our products are featured in the Amazon Buy Box, which significantly impacts sales and visibility.   9. **Amazon A9 Search Algorithm Optimization:** Implement strategies to improve product visibility and ranking in Amazon search results by optimizing keywords, titles, and product descriptions.   10. **Amazon Brand Registry and Protection:** Ensure proper brand registration and protection on Amazon India to safeguard against counterfeit products and unauthorized sellers. **Key Result Indicators (KRIs) for Amazon India:** 1. **Amazon India Market Share Growth:** Measure the increase in market share within relevant product categories on Amazon India compared to competitors.   2. **New Product Launch Performance:** Evaluate the success of new product launches on Amazon India, including sales performance, customer feedback, and market acceptance.   3. **Amazon India Vendor Performance:** Assess the performance as a vendor on Amazon India, including order accuracy, on-time delivery, and customer service metrics.   4. **Amazon India Advertising ROI:** Calculate the return on investment (ROI) for advertising campaigns conducted specifically on Amazon India to optimize ad spend and maximize sales.   5. **Amazon India Seller Central Health:** Monitor the health of the seller account on Amazon India, including metrics such as account health score, policy compliance, and performance notifications.   6. **Amazon India Price Competitiveness:** Evaluate pricing strategies and competitiveness relative to similar products on Amazon India to maximize sales and profitability.   7. **Amazon India Customer Engagement:** Measure customer engagement metrics such as click-through rates, session duration, and repeat purchase rates to assess the effectiveness of marketing efforts and product offerings.   8. **Amazon India Fulfillment Efficiency:** Monitor metrics related to order processing, shipping times, and customer delivery experience to ensure efficient fulfillment and positive customer experiences.   9. **Amazon India Enhanced Brand Content (EBC) Performance:** Assess the impact of enhanced brand content on product detail pages in driving conversions and improving the overall customer shopping experience.   10. **Amazon India Cross-Selling and Upselling Opportunities:** Identify opportunities to cross-sell and upsell complementary products to increase average order value and maximize revenue per customer. By focusing on these specific KPIs and KRIs tailored to Amazon India, the E-commerce Account Manager can effectively manage and optimize our presence on this crucial E-commerce platform, driving sales growth and maximizing opportunities in the Indian market.
